Articles.Content:
Hi there, 

I downloaded the KSP zip-file, and when unpacking, I got several errors from 7z, also from windows own unzipping tool:

CRC-Checksum error in file KSP\_win\KSP\_Data\sharedassets0.assets.resS

CRC-Checksum error in file KSP\_win\KSP\_Data\sharedassets12.assets

CRC-Checksum error in file KSP\_win\KSP\_Data\sharedassets0.assets

I tried several times, including deleting the zip file and redownloading...

The game doesn't start, I just get a black screen with some pinkish dots...

Any ideas, how to solve this?
